dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5098 IH: Economic Empowerment Through Predevelopment Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Carter of Louisiana (for himself and Mr. Graves of Louisiana) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, and in addition to the Committee on Financial Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To amend the Public Works and Economic Development Act of 1965 to authorize the Secretary of Commerce to make predevelopment grants, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Economic Empowerment Through Predevelopment Act of 2023.

paragraph.text: Title II of the Public Works and Economic Development Act of 1965 is amended by inserting after section 207 (42 U.S.C. 3147) the following:

subsection.text: On the application of an eligible recipient, the Secretary may make grants or cooperative agreements for—

paragraph.text: other predevelopment activities determined by the Secretary to be appropriate.

subsection.text: In the case of a project under this section that provides assistance to 1 or more eligible recipients with low organizational capacity, as determined by the Secretary, the Secretary may waive the prohibition under section 213.

paragraph.text: Section 204(c)(3) of the Public Works and Economic Development Act of 1965 (42 U.S.C. 3144(c)(3)) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in the paragraph heading, by inserting and PREDEVELOPMENT GRANTS after and TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE; and
by striking section 207 and inserting section 207 or 208.

paragraph.text: The table of contents contained in section 1(b) of the Public Works and Economic Development Act of 1965 (79 Stat. 552; 112 Stat. 3597; 118 Stat. 1761) is amended by inserting after the item relating to section 207 the following:

paragraph.header: Direct expenditure or redistribution by recipient
paragraph.text: Section 217(a) of the Public Works and Economic Development Act of 1965 (42 U.S.C. 3154c(a)) is amended by striking or 207 and inserting 207, or 208.
Section 601(a)(12) of the Public Works and Economic Development Act of 1965 (42 U.S.C. 3211(a)(12)) is amended by striking section 207 and inserting sections 207 and 208.
